price: 21. Mise waxay moodaan kuwa kasbada xumaha inaan la mid dhigeyno kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyey oo samaha fala, oo noloshooda6 iyo geeridooda sinnaan? Xumaa siday wax u xukumaan.
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱجۡتَرَحُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن نَّجۡعَلَهُمۡ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ سَوَآءٗ مَّحۡيَاهُمۡ وَمَمَاتُهُمۡۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ
footnotes: 6. Tafsiir kale waa: Xumaan falayaasha waa isku mid noloshooda iyo geeridooda. Macnaha waa ma aqbalaan hanuunka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am ḥasiba alladhīna ij'taraḥū al-sayiāti an najʿalahum ka-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti sawāan maḥyāhum wamamātuhum sāa mā yaḥkumūna
